name: guardian-of-alola
flavor_text:
The user, the Land Spirit Pokémon, obtains Alola’s
energy using its Z-Power and attacks the target with
full force. This reduces the target’s HP greatly.
effect_text_extend: Inflicts direct damage equal to ¾ of the target's remaining HP.
effect_text_simple: Damages the target for 75% of its remaining HP.
